Name

slide - zoom an image up for full screen display

Synopsis

slide inimage [backno]

Description

slide zoom an image up to the full screen size for display. This is useful when creating slides by photographing the screen directly. The option backno is used to select the color that the screen should be cleared to before drawing the image. backno can be one of three values, 0, 1, or 2. A value of 0 will draw a black background, a value of 1 draws a white background, and a value of 2 makes the background the same color as the lower lefthand pixel in the image.

See Also

izoom(6D) , grid(6D)
